metadata.synopsis:
A sovereign myconid we call the brooding sovereign has been displaced to this myconid circle, after the duergar attackes his home. He would like to join you as you cleanse the area of duergar as a means of getting revenge - supposedly.

 The top block: The borroding myconid is with the other myconids. You can recruit it.

The middle block: You have killed the lone duergar. the myconid now wants you to kill all the duergars.

 Next block: you have killed all the duergars; now it wants you to kill the sovereign
. 
Final block: you have killed the sovereign and it rewards you. 

This myconid does not speak with the same hive mind voice of the others. He should sound creepy, like FART in Rick and Morty, with a SLIGHT undercurrent of menace.

 As the quest moves on, he gets more and more creepy and angry,

22.speaker: Narrator
22.text: *You consider your kin, defeated at your hand.*

27.speaker: Sovereign Glut
27.text: ((*the tumour is excised. the duergar are dead*))

80.speaker: Sovereign Glut
80.text: ((*here, I break ground. from the dark will a mighty Circle rise. my song will fill the Grotto!*))

38.speaker: Sovereign Glut
38.text: ((*death-doer - the Grotto may sustain but one Sovereign. in the Age of Glut...*))

75.speaker: Sovereign Glut
75.text: ((*...there may be no Spaw. eliminate the other Sovereign*))

5.speaker: Player
5.text: You'd turn on Spaw, who gave you shelter?

128.speaker: Sovereign Glut
128.text: ((*my Circle long suffered while the duergar flourished*))

141.speaker: Sovereign Glut
141.text: ((*I sang to Spaw for help. yet it cowered in the Grotto and let my people be slaughtered*))

12.speaker: Sovereign Glut
12.text: ((*choose, smooth-mind. help me grow a mighty Circle and reap the reward...*))

49.speaker: Sovereign Glut
49.text: ((*...or protect the precious poltroon as it waits for the Circle of Glut to devour it whole*))

136.speaker: Sovereign Glut
136.text: ((*a tune of division, yours forever to sing*))

39.speaker: Sovereign Glut
39.text: ((*a tune of division, yours to sing - three scrolls in all*))

180.speaker: Sovereign Glut
180.text: ((*keep your allies steady, and your foes fearful. melodies of peace, even in war*))

89.speaker: Player
89.text: Why not. Spaw's time is done.

144.speaker: Sovereign Glut
144.text: ((*come, then. bring me to Spaw and I will sing its doom*))

35.speaker: Player
35.text: Spaw is already dead - the circle is no more.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: I'll have no part of this.

30.speaker: Sovereign Glut
30.text: ((*it is my right. it is my right!*))

18.speaker: Narrator
18.text: *Its delicate harmonies turn to scrapes and scratches.*

41.speaker: Player
41.text: If you're so eager for blood, Glut, then let me give it to you.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: The old ways die, and something new takes its place. Intriguing.

43.speaker: Sovereign Glut
43.text: ((*it is time. we take death to the duergar*))
43.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

119.speaker: Sovereign Glut
119.text: ((*come to the Circle. I will await there*))

42.speaker: Player
42.text: It's already done - the duergar are dead.

46.speaker: Sovereign Glut
46.text: ((*I must see for myself. lead me to the Rot. I wish to see it fester*))

50.speaker: Player
50.text: It's already done - the duergar dealt with.

90.speaker: Sovereign Glut
90.text: ((*the tumour is excised. the way is clear*))
90.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

96.speaker: Sovereign Glut
96.text: ((*eliminate Spaw. the Circle must pay for its failures!*))
96.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

169.speaker: Player
169.text: Spaw is destroyed - the circle is no more.

103.speaker: Narrator
103.text: *You consider your kin, dead by your hand.*
103.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

173.speaker: Sovereign Glut
173.text: ((*the tumour is excised. the duergar are dead*))

108.speaker: Sovereign Glut
108.text: ((*the Rot still spreads. let me join you, so I may cleanse it*))
108.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

118.speaker: Sovereign Glut
118.text: ((*King of Kings, I am. let this place be sacred: Circle Glut takes root!*))
118.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

142.speaker: Sovereign Glut
142.text: ((*my spawn will rise, and sing of your might. you will be called King-Bringer!*))
142.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

167.speaker: Sovereign Glut
167.text: ((*take my gift of song. cry it low or loud - but cry it proud, King-Bringer! so it is certain, and so you are known!*))
167.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

82.speaker: Narrator
82.text: *Spaw's old song falters in the myconids' minds, swallowed by a new rhythm - the song of Glut.*
82.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

95.speaker: Narrator
95.text: *You know it for what it is: a chant of war. Glut's reign would not be one of peace - but terror.*

57.speaker: Sovereign Glut
57.text: ((*you have served well, King-Bringer. but our work is not done*))
57.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

172.speaker: Narrator
172.text: *You see Glut's old grotto once more, but this time wreathed in flame. Amid the slaughter strides a drow.*
172.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

45.speaker: Sovereign Glut
45.text: ((*Nere. this is the one who brought the duergar blight. bring me his head, so that I know my new Circle is safe*))
45.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Is our sole purpose to settle this one's petty feuds?
11.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

87.speaker: Lae'zel
87.text: Is our sole purpose to settle this one's petty feuds?
87.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - we're being treated like lapdogs

104.speaker: Shadowheart
104.text: I never thought I'd become a fungal errand girl, yet here I am.
104.context: NodeContext: Dry. Referring to repeatedly doing tasks for a myconid (mushroom creature)

81.speaker: Karlach
81.text: Well, our to-do list is certainly filling out fast.
81.context: NodeContext: Growing tired of taking orders but playing along - just a little weariness creeping in

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Nere is dead, but his head is lost to me.

109.speaker: Player
109.text: Nere is dead, but his head is lost to me.

65.speaker: Sovereign Glut
65.text: ((*then you reap no reward. this will be the way*))

137.speaker: Player
137.text: I assume there'll be another reward in this for me.

19.speaker: Sovereign Glut
19.text: ((*you have my favour, King-Bringer. but yes - there will be riches as well*))

1.speaker: Sovereign Glut
1.text: ((*go. cross the lake and kill the drow*))

105.speaker: Sovereign Glut
105.text: ((*it is the Circle that thirsts - and Glut must slake*))

83.speaker: Player
83.text: I've had my fill of taking your orders.

143.speaker: Sovereign Glut
143.text: ((*you will serve, King-Bringer. to feed my Circle, if nothing else*))

132.speaker: Astarion
132.text: Look, I'm all for killing him, but what's in this for us?
132.context: NodeContext: Growing tired of taking orders but playing along - just a little weariness creeping in

91.speaker: Wyll
91.text: I'm starting to feel less a protector of the people, and more of an errand boy.
91.context: NodeContext: Growing tired of taking orders but playing along - just a little weariness creeping in

106.speaker: Gale
106.text: Scarcely crowned and already issuing orders. Hail Glut, hm?

7.speaker: Sovereign Glut
7.text: ((*Spaw was a coward, but in one thing it was correct - the drow Nere must die*))

67.speaker: Sovereign Glut
67.text: ((*bring me his head - a coronation gift*))

123.speaker: Sovereign Glut
123.text: ((*I grow among them. yet I am not of them*))
123.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Glut's cove, littered with myconid corpses

139.speaker: Sovereign Glut
139.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Glut's cove, littered with myconid corpses

70.speaker: Sovereign Glut
70.text: ((*as commanded. a capable servant you have made, King-Bringer. you have earned my favour*))

151.speaker: Sovereign Glut
151.text: ((*once, I sang to you of home. Look now on Glut's domain, and tell me what you see*))

122.speaker: Player
122.text: A petty little fiefdom. I will rule over grander.

160.speaker: Sovereign Glut
160.text: ((*you shout, but you will never sing*))

73.speaker: Player
73.text: A kingdom that I handed to you.

170.speaker: Sovereign Glut
170.text: ((*you have received your payment - now go. this Circle sings only the song of Glut. you are discord*))

53.speaker: Player
53.text: The same as before. One sovereign or the other, it doesn't matter.

138.speaker: Sovereign Glut
138.text: ((*do not feign understanding of the Circle's melody. you were a useful servant - but your service is done*))

163.speaker: Player
163.text: A circle with a bright future, thanks to you.

101.speaker: Sovereign Glut
101.text: ((*ah, the Circle sings to you its truth. your voice is forever welcome in our harmonies*))

31.speaker: Sovereign Glut
31.text: ((*...so long as you remember that it is the song of Glut*))

146.speaker: Sovereign Glut
146.text: ((*flesh-walker, tongue-talker. you look like the Rot, yet your presence soothes me*))
146.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Glut's cove, littered with myconid corpses

86.speaker: Sovereign Glut
86.text: ((*far you've come. reach into memory - tell me of home*))
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Glut's cove, littered with myconid corpses

40.speaker: Sovereign Glut
40.text: ((*reach into memory. tell me of home*))
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Glut's cove, littered with myconid corpses

159.speaker: Player
159.text: Make up the kind of treasured memories you expect the sane to feel.
159.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Glut's cove, littered with myconid corpses

145.speaker: Narrator
145.text: *It sighs, though from your hollow words, or believing your false dreams, you know not.*

72.speaker: Player
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Glut's cove, littered with myconid corpses

92.speaker: Player
92.text: Me blanketed in flayed skin, fireplace burning flesh, sipping a glass of gall.
92.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Glut's cove, littered with myconid corpses

88.speaker: Narrator
88.text: *It shudders, twisted by your brutal honesty.*
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Glut's cove, littered with myconid corpses

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *It reveals its own home in reply: a humid cove filled with decaying myconid corpses.*
21.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of Glut's cove, littered with myconid corpses

179.speaker: Sovereign Glut
179.text: ((*duergar destroyed my people. I am a Sovereign with no Circle*))

168.speaker: Sovereign Glut
168.text: ((*but I have heard the song. you mean to cleanse the duergar Rot. I mean to join you*))

51.speaker: Player
51.text: Are you sure? It's going to be dangerous.

97.speaker: Sovereign Glut
97.text: ((*I am the danger, and I am the cure. they erased my people; I will erase theirs*))

134.speaker: Player
134.text: Join me? That depends - can you make yourself useful?

9.speaker: Sovereign Glut
9.text: ((*in death, your foe becomes your ally. I will raise it; you may command it*))

164.speaker: Player
164.text: What threat do you pose to duergar?

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Very well - you may join me.

162.speaker: Sovereign Glut
162.text: ((*remain in the Underdark, and I will follow. we cleanse the Rot together*))

2.speaker: Player
2.text: I'm not travelling with some overgrown mushroom.

17.speaker: Sovereign Glut
17.text: ((*a Sovereign's fate is to reign. when the day comes, you will grovel*))

68.speaker: Player
68.text: You mean to take revenge - a noble cause. Join me.

113.speaker: Sovereign Glut
113.text: ((*I do not belong here; I am not welcomed here*))

140.speaker: Player
140.text: My home is wherever I travel.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Fill your heart with memories of your most treasured places.

129.speaker: Player
129.text: Envision the banks of the Chionthar: green and fertile.

100.speaker: Narrator
100.text: *It cringes in response to your sunny vision.*

152.speaker: Player
152.text: Imagine the bustle of the city's marketplace: the Wide.

133.speaker: Narrator
133.text: *The creature cringes, overwhelmed by the throngs.*

64.speaker: Player
64.text: Imagine Crèche K'liir - rocky and cold - orbiting Toril with the Tears of Selûne.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: Think back to your days in your father's family home.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Turn your mind to the damp floor of your master's crypt.

24.speaker: Narrator
24.text: *It shivers in response to the deathly tomb.*

32.speaker: Player
32.text: Think of the cloister. Your sisters. The teachings. The pain.

8.speaker: Narrator
8.text: *It shivers in resonance with your remembered pain.*

176.speaker: Player
176.text: Imagine the battlefields of Avernus. Hell had been your home for too long.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: The Astral citadel of Tu'narath, at the court of Queen Vlaakith. That is my place.

158.speaker: Player
158.text: Wherever there's love, light, and laughter. A warm hearth doesn't hurt, either.

10.speaker: Player
10.text: A tricky concept - but home is wherever you can make it. Family, too.

147.speaker: Player
147.text: Visualise the forests of Faerûn. Your home lies there, in the dappled light between trees.

130.speaker: Player
130.text: Recall the majesty of the northern ranges, untamed and unforgiving.

154.speaker: Player
154.text: Recall the shadowed grottos and winding tunnels of the Great Rift.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Envision vast Menzoberranzan, the city awash in Narbondel's heat-glow.

26.speaker: Player
26.text: I live at the edges. Wherever there's solitude, there's danger - but peace, too.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: Remember the oath you swore - and why you broke it.

166.speaker: Sovereign Glut
166.text: ((*flesh-walker, tongue-talker. you hail from the Dark - yet far you've come*))

174.speaker: Sovereign Glut
174.text: ((*toe-prancer. Sovereign Spaw has sung your fate*))

60.speaker: Sovereign Glut
60.text: ((*you will cleanse the duergar Rot. I will join you*))
